title.rendered: The Latest in Biotech Jobs: June 2017

content.rendered:
Are you interested in a new biotech career? ClinLab Staffing agency works with life science, pharmaceutical, and biotech organizations to manage their staffing needs and bring exciting new job opportunities to you. See what jobs have been available in June 2017.

QA Senior Specialist (Raw Material Laboratory Compliance)
Morrisville, NC

  • Performs raw material testing, as assigned.
  • Reviews analytical data associated with raw material testing, including results from third party contract laboratories and method qualification / validation protocols, ensuring compliance to specifications / acceptance criteria, for testing not directly performed.
  • Reviews raw material item specifications for testing requirements and sampling plans.
  • Evaluates new raw materials for testing determination with compliance to master plan, compendia and ICH requirements.

read more… 

Sr. Manufacturing Specialist
Winston Salem, North Carolina
We are currently seeking an experienced senior manufacturing specialist.  The successful candidate will perform cell culture techniques, support mammalian cell culture manufacturing processes, operate various process equipment, and document daily manufacturing operations in a cGMP environment. Candidate will produce products by setting-up, cleaning, performing cell culture and following aseptic procedures. Additionally, the successful candidate will be responsible for following current good manufacturing practices (cGMP), training junior personnel, planning, scheduling, and leading team activities, revising SOPs and batch records, and other duties as required. read more… 

Cell Biology Scientist
Winston Salem, North Carolina

Full-time, Permanent
Primary Job Function:

  • Apply techniques of tissue culture, histology and molecular biology to support the company’s bio-printer development.
  • Develop advanced techniques for handling and analysis of cells, tissues, biomaterials and bioreactors.
  • Confirm system and product capabilities by applying current testing methods and work to designing new ones.
  • Manage and maintain databases, keep laboratory notebooks, analyze data, prepare presentations and write reports.

read more… 

Associate Scientist/Scientist (DMPK)
Greater Boston Area
Our client is seeking a hands-on, highly motivated Associate Scientist/Scientist with extensive ADME expertise. The successful candidate will actively participate in experimental design. The ideal candidate will be independent, self-motivated, collaborative and able to multitask effectively. This position will work closely with laboratory staff to ensure that experimental and data processing aspects of in vitro DMPK and ADMET studies are performed to a high standard and within scheduled time frames. read more… 

Submit your application to ClinLab Staffing today for the opportunity to be placed in biotech job that is best for you. Resumes can be submitted to: info@clinlabstaffing.com.
